name: Jacobs Stephen B Group PC Reviews

review.title: “Starchitect work environment”
review.pros: Pros – All projects get built - good opportunity to learn about the industry in New York. Project managers are helpful and knowledgeable. Office is a laid back, low drama work environment.
review.cons: Cons – The work environment is very hierarchical. Junior positions are pure production, cad-monkey type of work.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – It would be good to make younger architects feel a little more involved and invested in projects.
